text: Arau tomaloke uttama panthara bahirae kitabisakalara lagata bitarka nakaraiba, kintu sihamtara majata yisakale an'yaya karaiche sihamtara lagata karaiba paraa. Tomaloke koraa, ‘amara prati arau tomalokara prati yi aratirna haiche tara oparata ami imana anicho. Amara ilaha arau tomalokara ilaha ejane'i, ami te'omra pratihe atmasamarpanakarai’
